chunks.cleaned_english_translation:
<speak>
        <s>
      On the Prophet and the Apostle.
    </s>
<break time="1s"/>
</speak>

The prophetic readings, especially from the Old Testament, reprove wrongs and announce the future. This helps us understand that the same God who thundered in prophecy also taught through the Apostle and shone in the splendor of the Gospel.
chunks.original_latin:
Lectio vero prophetica suum tenet ordinem, veteris
videlicet testamenti corripiens mala et adnuncians
futura, ut intelligamus ipsum Deum esse, qui in prophetia
tonuit, quam qui et in Apostolo docuit, et in
Evangelico splendore refulsit.
